review: I like being able to choose between using the dedicated remote with apps installed on the stick or casting from my tablet, but there is a problem that pops up periodically. Playback becomes jerky or freezes entirely. It's as if old data can't be dumped from RAM. Unplugging the stick and plugging it back in clears this up. They need to make the memory more efficient in this matter or give us an easier way to reset.
